title: Who's Behind Black Art
overview: Who's Behind Black Art is a compelling four-part docuseries that dives into the lives of five emerging artists—Adrian Armstrong, Jewel Ham, Laurena Finéus, Mario Joyce, and Tae Ham—as they navigate the art world and the unique challenges often faced by artists of color. These talented individuals are part of the Good Black Art community, a groundbreaking platform founded by Philip Collins, fully dedicated to supporting emerging Black artists.
